about_the_game:
BATTLE YOUR FRIENDS


Dusk Warlocks is an online multiplayer spellcasting game in which up to 4 players compete in an unforgiving tactical battle. Learn how different spells work with one another and come up with cool spell combos. Your objective is to capture the energy crystal before other players kill you or kill the player that is currently trying to capture it.

BUILD YOUR SPELL ARSENAL


The spells you use, that's completely up to you! Spells are categorized into 7 elements: Fire, Water, Ice, Air, Stone, Wood and Electricity. Every element has many spells to choose from, which makes the possible combinations almost endless. Pick out the 3 elements you want to fight with and equip 2 spells to each.

CREATE YOUR WARLOCK


Dusk Warlocks features 30+ different characters as well as thousands of unique spell combinations that allow you to make your Warlock feel unique and personalized.

name: Dusk Warlocks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.40 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.40 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Ever wished to fight using large scale spells? Dusk Warlocks is an online multiplayer spellcasting game in which up to 4 players compete in a tactical battle.
